@rem @eleven_ty Not the answer, but a nice related tip: I like defining my templates in the eleventy config. It makes them easier to move around and is handy if you're moving to @eleven_ty from another SSG like Jekyll, where you might already have declared your layouts. https://t.co/ejZmRUceIH
